channel.title: [634] RuneMTP - Special Bar %'s?
channel.description: Anyone have any idea how to change how much a special attack drains your special bar in Marcbob's RuneMTP 634? I'm trying to lower the Korasi's special drain from its current 55% to 50%. Reputationnnnns for anyone who gets it correct.

item.title: [634] RuneMTP - Special Bar %'s?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

you realize there is no combatassistant right?
Aswell spec accuracy would just increase how high and how often it would hit…
This isn’t a PI it’s a 634…

Read full topic

item.title: [634] RuneMTP - Special Bar %'s?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

I think it is in combatassistant.java

Look for korasi’s sword ID and under in a line somewhere look for:

spec accuracy = ##;

Change the ## to the number it should be not sure which one figure that out yourself.

Read full topic
